message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $150, which reflects its true value.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I've done some research and I think that's a fair price for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $80 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $130. I believe this still reflects the product's quality and value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110. I'm really interested in the product and I think that's a fair price for both of us.
